settings.heading: Are Krafti Art toys completely handmade?
settings.row_content: Yes. Every Krafti Art toy is carefully handcrafted by skilled artisans. Each piece is stitched, shaped, and finished by handâ€”making every toy unique and slightly different from the others.

settings.heading: What materials are used to make these handmade toys?
settings.row_content: We use premium, child-safe materials, including Soft cotton yarn / organic cotton fabric, Non-toxic, AZO-free dyes All materials are safe for kids and gentle on the skin.

settings.heading: Do dining chairs come in sets or are they sold individually?
settings.row_content: We offer both options. You can buy individual chairs or value sets (2, 4, or 6) depending on your space and needs.

settings.heading: How do I wash or clean the handmade toys?
settings.row_content:
To extend durability, we recommend, Spot cleaning with mild soap and water
Avoid machine wash unless mentioned on the product

settings.heading: Do the colors fade after washing?
settings.row_content:
No. We use high-quality, non-toxic, fade-resistant colors.
If washed gently as recommended, the colors stay bright for years.

settings.heading: Can I bulk order for events or gifting?
settings.row_content: Yes, you can place bulk orders for events or gifting. We offer special bulk pricing and customization options for occasions such as baby showers, birthdays, school events, corporate gifting, and festive celebrations. Whether you need uniform.
